metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9044 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The print_symbol_for_build_attribute function in readelf.c in GNU Binutils 2017-04-12 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid read and SEGV) via a crafted ELF file.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> Likely fixed by one of CVE-2017-9043 CVE-2017-9042 CVE-2017-9041 CVE-2017-9040 CVE-2017-9039 CVE-2017-9038

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.32-8ubuntu1').
